name: Glowing Black Button (Barbiegirl design edit)
description: This button I have derived from style 17353 of user 13023 . The full credit goes to her. I have just made some minor changes. Hope she does not mind it. The modified button is very much suitable for my style  style 13864 . I am also enabling this style only for web pages and not for browser buttons.
additional_info:
Updates --

2009-05-09 : Does not mangle the Google search comment, cross, up-arrow as well most such YouTube buttons. These buttons were rendered in a mangled way before this update. Rationalization of dimensions.
2009-05-06 : Better highlighting of buttons.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You may use this style even without any of my other style. However if you heart is truly black ... you would certainly give my other styles a try ... :D :D style 13864 and style 14093 . Since I personally use this style, just as I do with all three of my styles, I will keep updating it whenever required.

Let the dark forces prevail !!!!!!!!!!

Amen !!


PS : The 'before' screenshot is with companion-I and II already running.

Caveat : If you see some buttons or images (esp in youtube) being displayed incorrectly, please check whether this style is at fault. There is no gurantee what this style will do to unconventional buttons. However I will try my best to correct those if brought to my notice. If you have any solutions please write in the comments. I will be happy to incorporate and credit it to you.

discussions.name: Wonderful and Thankyou for the acknowlegement Nira
